name: Galaxy Cowboys - A Free Space Shooting Game
name_original: Galaxy Cowboys - A Free Space Shooting Game
description:
Galaxy Cowboys is a fast-paced side-scroller shoot'em'up action arcade game. You're reactions and reflexes will be tested in this addicting game.

Features:
- 4 Different Ships
- Bosses!
- Hundreds of enemies
- Different attack patterns and waves

Discover the excitement of a no frills, no fluff, just straight shooting action.
